name: function-call-demo
description: this is a demo AIConfig to show function calling using OpenAI

input.content: I really enjoyed reading {{book}}, could you recommend me a book that is similar and tell me why?

functions.name: list
functions.description: list queries books by genre, and returns a list of names of books

functions.name: search
functions.description: search queries books by their name and returns a list of book names and their ids

functions.name: get
functions.description: get returns a book's detailed information based on the id of the book. Note that this does not accept names, and only IDs, which you can get by using search.

system_prompt.content: Please use our book database, which you can access using functions to answer the following questions.
